alert.note: Alert for Clarion; Forest; Jefferson (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 10:47PM EST until February 19 at 3:30AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Clarion River At Cooksburg affecting Jefferson PA, Clarion and Forest Counties.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/pbz. PAC031-053-065-181600- /O.EXT.KPBZ.FL.W.0006.220218T0817Z-220219T0830Z/ /COKP1.2.ER.220218T0817Z.220218T1800Z.220219T0230Z.NO/ 1047 PM EST Thu Feb 17 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clarion River at Cooksburg. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Macbeth Cabins flood and water reaches River Road near the State Park office At 14.0 feet, About 1 foot of water covers River Road near the Cook Forest State Park office. At 17.0 feet, The basement of the Cook Forest State Park office starts flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 15.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.2 feet on 06/21/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
